CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 23, 1960, pg. 3, reads: "Hospital Hostesses - [Among the hostesses at] Monday's ceremonies when the Leach Farm Tuberculosis Hospital was renamed the C. Howard Marcy Hospital were, left to right, Shirley Mohr, Marjorie Cunningham, Eileen Stevenson, Helen Gable, Willa Brown, Dolores Redwood, Ophelia Hopson and Alice Manuel. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Hosts Shirley Mohr, Marjorie Cunningham, Eileen Stevenson, Helen Gable, Willa Brown, Dolores Redwood, Ophelia Hopson, and Alice Manuel at renaming ceremony of C. Howard Marcy Hospital
